DO I need to take an IHSS course for my: Taking an IHSS course is not a requirement for pathways, but for the overall HASS requirement. Although some pathways might require a specific IHSS course.
Do I need to take a 4000 level courese f: Check the individual pathway requirements. Some pathways might require one course to be 4000 level and some might not.
DO I need to take communication intensiv: This is not a requirement for the pathways.
Am I allowed to come up with my own path: Students are not allowed to create their own pathway.
Can my pathway count towards a minor?: Yes, lots of pathways even have an associated minor which sometimes might only require one more course to achieve.
